Text:
Here's some more info on the whole Mac on a stick idea: http://nothickmanuals.info/doku.php?id=minivmac

Here's a link to software for an old Mac system: http://minivmac.sourceforge.net/sw/index.html

Personally, I was just going through some crap yesterday to throw out and still couldn't toss my reg'd copies of Empire Master, Spectre, and Wordtris. Now I've got something to do with them.

Thanks for the upload dmpop!
does this work work on windows? XP ?
It worked perfect for me. Thanks.
